mapper.sql: select ID, NAME, GENDER, AGE, BIRTHDAY, DEGREE, CELLPHONE, EMAIL, HOBBY, INTRO, LASTUPDTIME from user
mapper.insert: insert into user (NAME, GENDER, AGE, BIRTHDAY, DEGREE, CELLPHONE, EMAIL, HOBBY, INTRO) values (#{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{birthday}, #{degree}, #{cellphone}, #{email}, #{hobby}, #{intro})
mapper.delete: delete from user where ID in #{item}
